captions.text: Mother, I just came to the bus stop.
<i>'Enquiry seems to be closed'</i>

Excuse me?
<i>Just a minute</i>
Ok ok
Yes mom! This Bangalore bus is one hour late.
If she had answered the call,
we wouldn't face all these problems.
Ok bye.

Yes tell me.
<i>Wanted to ask about the Bangalore bus.</i>
But you just told.

i got the answer.
<i>The bus is late by 1 hour</i>
What can we do?
These busses never come on time.
yes correct. Now what do i do this one hour?
Do we have a tea stall around?
Yes we have one close by. Do you want to go?

Yes. <i>Ok lets go!</i>
 Are you working?
No, I'm looking for one.
Brother two cups of tea
<Radio playing>
By the way whom are you waiting for at this time?
A girl from my class.
I am waiting for her.
Is she your girl friend?
Might be, if she accepts.
Oh, people dont wait even after acceptence.
How come you're waiting for a 'maybe'.
Actually i want to propose to her now.
What! now?
In a bus stop?
Why dont you go home, get her some flowers..
or give her a surprise gift while you propose.
Already i tried to plan and tell her.
But i missed it.
But this time i will not let it happen.
No matter what, I will tell her.
Are your guys from the same college?
No
O! So the love story started during High School?
No
Ok so, Is she at least your childhood friend?
No!
How do you know her then?
She was my school friend.
I still remember the way she used to look.
Little fat ...
Vizay that... Vijay this.. she used to run around
I never took her seriously.
But one fine day morning.
While i was going through my Facebook account.
Checking my notifications.
That's when I saw her for the first time.
God, she's so beautiful!
I could not recognize her.
I wondered if she is the same girl...
...I used to tease
Is she the same girl?
or May be not!
I could not deny the fact that it was her.
I used to log into facebook everyday to see her profile pic.
I would have seen it a 1000 times
Her profile seems to be like my home page.
I wanted to see her as soon as i logged in.
Yet i could not decide if i had to add her or not.
What is the problem in adding? She is your school friend right?
I even add girls i dont know.
No, this is different.
I had a crush on her the minute i saw her.
It would hurt my ego if she does not accept my add request.
I decided not to see her pictures anymore.
Well, I restricted myself from logging into Facebook.
But i could not avoide the traffic of thoughts  in my head.
and the confussion that came along with it.
I could see her almost anywhere and everywhere.
I was going through a phase of hallucination.
Irrespective of her presence
I used to talk to her as if she was in front of me.
I finally deciced to add her as this state of mind was taking me no where.
So what happened? Did she accept your request?
Yes, To my surprise she accepted the request just the next day.
But starting the conversation was the toughest part.
I used to keep the chat window open everyday
with a hope that i will find courage to start the conversation.
But i could never figure out  the best way to start the conversation.
Hi!
No, Vijay thats very routine. Try something cool.
Huff! Try something cool.
Cool!
Hey! What's up Babe!
No, It's become too cool.
Do you remember me?
No, what if she says 'No'
that would be embarrassing!
Hey are you there.
come on! why would she be online if she is not there.
Huff!!
For every move i wanted to take, my mind would oppose it.
But one night i finally gained courage.
H
E
L
L
O
Enter!!
anxiety! tension! fear!
and the uncertainty of its outcome.
I know its was just a simple 'hello'
but  what if!
Who are you?
Do i know you?
I dont remember you!
are the kind of messages i feared.
But breaking all my imaginations I received a small message.
Hi!
Received the message in a minute but that seemed like an hour.
The conversation continued from there.
Then it went on and on.
Then i took her phone number.
She remembers everything.
All the childhood games.
At first i wanted to call her.
But decided not to.
But to my surprise, One fine day...
yes, where?
yes, the same place.
i just came.
how long will it take you to come here?
Ok come as soon as possible. Bye.
<dial tone>
Where are you?
Sir we are calling from customer care.
yes
Sir we have some interesting offers.
Just give me 5 mins of your time.
I am not interested.
Sir please sir.
I am not interested.
please listen once sir.
please im not interested.
please understand please.
(Please Sir, Lift the call once. I've got good offers :P)
I was fooled. Damn!

It was her.
<i>Was it?</i>
I heard her voice for the first time.
Her voice was so sweet.
I used to loose track of time while talking to her.
I used to walk miles while talking to her.
She used to doze off during our conversation.
i used to disconnect the call with out disturbing her any further.
only then i would realize...
...that i used to end up at weird places.
Some times right at the middle of the road.
and other times at other places.
You will not believe me if i tell you
that i lost 5kgs from walking miles during conversations.
Come on! how much can you guys possibly talk?
Nothing apart from the regular 'A' grade crap, thats all.
Interesting! what happened later?
Later, Even when asleep i used to imagine talking to her.
While watching TV suddenly i used to assume that my phone is ringing.
I would check the log & I'd realize it never rang.
Once she got a wrong call.
May be everyone faces such situations.
I decided to show my power.
I decided to play a hero.
hello
Why do you sound so dull.
No, Its nothing.
No, its ok tell me what is the matter.
Nothing actually, I have been receiving crazy calls from a guy lately.
Who is he?
Its ok leave it.
Who is he?
Lleave the matter! Its ok forget it.
Message me his number.
Ok
Next day i prepared myself to bash him up.
So did you hit him?
Yeah dude, I smashed him!
My troubles started from that incident.
I became a pizza delivery boy whenever she was hungry.
Sometimes, I'd exhaust all the petrol
Sometimes I was chased by dogs.
I even used to write records for her.
Sometimes I jumped walls
Were my parents awaken, I'd have been bashed.
She even has a brother.
But he was asleep all the time, so no worries
But its always a risk if he gets up.
One fine day it was her birthday.
That night i bought a cake and decided to propose her.
Hey, where are you?
I had to come to Bangalore, will call you later.
Ok!
What did you do then?
What else could i do? I went home and ate the cake myself.
Dont worry. She will definitely accept your proposal.
Hopefully!
Its been an hour. The bus should have reached by now.
Shall we leave?
Yes, lets go.
I LOVE YOU!
Brother!
Oh God, Bless my Father!
Brother-in-law, Can U increase the radio volume?
Till now, you addressed me as a 'brother'..
..and now you call me a 'Brother-in-law'?
Girl:<i>Its ok Bro, Its just the volume, Pleace increase it!</i>
Brother- Alright, I should get used to it now.
You would have forgotten me had I not called you, right?
How can i forget you? You're My First Crush!

comments.text:
This is quite good stuff... and I loved watching it all through. What I 
liked is its natural appeal in a bus stand rather in a plush bungalow or 
some A class gated community. However, I would somehow request you to come 
off the exhibitory richness, just for the sake of it, as in 'I am happy.' I 
like I am happy too for its Dhaba appeal and let me complement that girl's 
smile, to say, is as Nithya Menon's. Kudos brothers. Andaram kalistene 
Andhra.
